data.text: Yahweh was extremely angry with us;
Yahweh destroyed the homes of the people of [PRS] Judah;
Because he was extremely angry,
He bent his bow to prepare to shoot us, his people,
Yahweh has become like an enemy
He has caused his temple to be smashed
Yahweh has rejected his own altar
Yahweh was determined
The city gates have collapsed;
The old men of Jerusalem [MTY] sit on the ground,
My eyes are very tired because of my tears;
They cry out to their mothers,
You people of Jerusalem [MTY, DOU],
The prophets among you claimed that they had seen visions from Yahweh,
All those who pass by you
Now all our enemies scoff [IDM] at you;
Yahweh has done what he planned;
I wish/desire that the walls of Jerusalem [APO]
Get up every night and cry out;
Yahweh, look, and think about it!
The corpses of people of all ages lie in the streets;
You summoned our enemies to attack us from every direction,
